title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the expected functionality is not present.
OB: When opening the context menu, the Team entry is missing.
EB: The Team entry should be present in the context menu.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the file explorer or project navigator. 2. Right-click on a .java file and another resource at the same time. 3. Observe that the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
